# ğŸŒ± greenfootprint

**greenfootprint** is a lightweight Python tool that estimates the energy consumption and carbon footprint of any Python script. It helps developers measure the environmental impact of their code in terms of runtime, CPU usage, energy, and COâ‚‚ emissions.

## ğŸ“¦ Features

- ğŸ” Analyze energy and carbon usage of a Python script
- âš™ï¸ Uses runtime and CPU time to estimate watt-hours
- ğŸŒ«ï¸ Converts energy usage to estimated COâ‚‚ grams
- ğŸ“Š Simple CLI with clean output
- ğŸ§  Tips to improve efficiency (coming soon)

## ğŸ› ï¸ Installation & RUN
